title: Atlanta BeltLine Adventure
shortDescription: Discover the beauty and vibrancy of the Atlanta BeltLine with this engaging scavenger hunt!
fullDescription: Explore the scenic trails, iconic murals, and unique spots along the Atlanta BeltLine. Perfect for a fun and active outing for locals and visitors alike!

missions.title: Ponce City Market Entrance
missions.shortDescription: Start your journey at the bustling Ponce City Market BeltLine entrance.
missions.hint: Look for the popular spot where shopping, dining, and trails meet.

missions.title: Historic Fourth Ward Park
missions.shortDescription: Take a stroll through the beautiful Historic Fourth Ward Park.
missions.hint: Look for a serene green space with a pond and amphitheater along the BeltLine.

missions.title: Krog Street Tunnel
missions.shortDescription: Check out the vibrant street art at Krog Street Tunnel.
missions.hint: Find the tunnel where Atlanta's graffiti scene comes alive.

missions.title: Old Fourth Ward Skatepark
missions.shortDescription: Visit the lively Old Fourth Ward Skatepark.
missions.hint: Look for a hub of activity with skaters and a connection to the BeltLine.

missions.title: The BeltLine Arboretum
missions.shortDescription: Explore the lush greenery and educational exhibits at the BeltLine Arboretum.
missions.hint: Look for an area showcasing native plants along the Eastside Trail.

missions.title: The Shed at Ponce City Market
missions.shortDescription: End your adventure with a meal or drink at The Shed.
missions.hint: Find the open-air space offering views of the BeltLine and local vendors.
